trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 도메인에 대 한 기본 버퍼링 된 그래픽 컨텍스트 개체에 대 한 액세스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsManager class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: BufferedGraphicsManager 클래스를 사용 하면 해당 그래픽에 대 한 사용자 지정 이중 버퍼링을 구현할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: 이중 버퍼링을 사용 하는 그래픽 줄이거나 깜빡임을 표시 화면을 그려서 발생 하는 제거할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에 정적 속성이 하나 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, 주 반환 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>은 현재 어플리케이션 도메인에 대 한.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>클래스가 생성 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>버퍼링 된 그래픽을 그리는 데 사용할 수 있는 인스턴스.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>클래스도 작성 되어야 하며 public 생성자가 없습니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>사용 하 여 응용 프로그램 도메인에 대 한 개체의 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 검색할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>정적에서은 현재 어플리케이션 도메인에 대 한 개체 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: 이중 버퍼링에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [이중 버퍼링 그래픽](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, 및 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> 은 현재 어플리케이션 도메인에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Within an application the Current property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 응용 프로그램 내에서 속성은 항상 반환 동일한 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>개체입니다.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> 은 현재 어플리케이션 도메인에 대 한 합니다.
